snippet: Good Friday was an official holiday in Cuba for the first time in a half century, but few Roman Catholics on the island seemed to use the day off to attend Mass.
abstract: Few Roman Catholics in Cuba attend Mass on Good Friday, which was deemed an official holiday in Cuba for the first time in a half century.
lead_paragraph: Good Friday was an official holiday in Cuba for the first time in a half century, but few Roman Catholics on the island seemed to use the day off to attend Mass.
